Description: Out For Season (Achilles) - The Pacers confirmed that Haliburton will miss the 2025-2026 season as he recovers from a torn Achilles.
Out (Knee) - Nesmith is expected to be out for around four weeks, Dustin Dopirak of The Indianapolis Star reports.
Day To Day (Calf) - The Pacers listed Sheppard as Doubtful onn Thursday's (Dec.18) game against the Knicks.
Out (Foot) - The Pacers announced that Toppin will undergo foot surgery and miss at least three months.
